Question & Options:
In the movie 'Bhuj: The Pride of India' (2021), which characters are connected to significant historical figures or events?
Options:

B. B) Indira Gandhi as the Prime Minister of India
C. C) Sanjay Dutt as a fictional character
D. D) Sonakshi Sinha as a nurse
Correct Answer: A) Ajay Devgn as Squadron Leader Vijay Srinivas Karnik, B) Indira Gandhi as the Prime Minister of India
